Title: How to get allocations in .NET? And how big is an empty array?
Description:
Often times we hear about allocations on the heap. How can we easily measure this? This article will show you a very easy way of doing so.
Plus we will answer the question how big is an empty array? And if you think 0 bytes, then spoiler alert, that is not the case at all.

Title: New Metrics Capabilities for OpenTelemetry on Azure Monitor
Description: Microsoft released for preview a series of updates to its Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry Exporter packages for .NET, Node.js and Python applications.

Title: Microsoft Introduces New Azure HX and HBv4 Virtual Machines for High-Performance Computing
Description: Microsoft recently announced new HBv4-series and HX-series virtual machines (VMs) in preview suitable for high-performance computing (HPC) workloads such as computational fluid dynamics (CFD), finite element analysis, frontend and backend electronic design automation (EDA), rendering, molecular dynamics, computational geoscience, weather simulation, AI inference, and financial risk analysis.

Title: Integrate logging in a ASP.NET Core application using Serilog and Seq
Description: This post is about how to integrate logging in a asp.net core application using Serilog and Seq. Serilog is a logging framework for .NET. Seq is the intelligent search, analysis, and alerting server built specifically for modern structured log data. We can use Seq for free if you’re developing solo and requires a license if you’re building professionally. For more details visit seq pricing page

Title: The Windows Phone SE site has been archived
Description:
TL;DR
Today we are announcing that Windows Phone SE has been archived.
Why now?
The Stack Exchange network is a lot like a neighborhood. Each individual site makes up a house in that neighborhood. ...

Title: I Quit my Programmer Job to Become a Chicken
Description: Puk Puk Pukaaak! Cluck cluck… Bwak Bwak Bwaaak, puk puk pukaaak! Cluck-cluck-cluck bok.
